website_summaries.verdict: You best choice for a great-looking, versatile maxi dress made of quality materials.
pros: A distinctive style for day or night
cons: Runs somewhat smaller and longer than other maxi dresses

customer_reviews.title: Good length for Plus and Tall
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10, size 16/18. I bought this dress in an XL hoping and praying length and cut would be flattering. This dress is awesome. I wore it to an outdoor wedding with 2.5 inch heeled ankle height booties. No leg showing but also not hitting the ground at all. I'm wearing it today as well with 1.5 inch sandals and the length is perfect, not touching the ground but hitting just below the ankle. The cut is super flattering. I prefer shape wear underneath for a smooth silhouette as the fabric is thin. It's wrinkle free even after being wadded up in my suitcase. Love this dress and will buy more like it!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Griffith Hotvedt

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal you!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made dress. 5'4" /130 athletic w/ curves. small is a perfect fit. I absolutely love this dress. Arrived before time. This dress makes me look and feel like a ...phenomenal woman!
customer_reviews.author: Massiel

customer_reviews.title: Boho
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and look for clothing that is comfortable to sot on plane for long hours. This dress was beyong comfortable & looked great
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! I get a lot of compliments from my mom every time I wear it. I'm 5'2 115-120lbs depending on whether I eat ice cream or kale for dinner. I got 3 inches hemmed off the bottom because I don't like tripping...on my clothes. Anyway this dress is awesome for church, work, or Netflix and chill.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always uncertain about purchasing clothing online because it never seems to fit right, but this dress is amazing! I am 5'9", 130 pounds, 34D, and it fits perfectly. Certain times I might have to pin the front if I don't want it that revealing. The fabric is very soft and colors are beautiful. People have complained about arms being too tight. They are just right on me but my arms are pretty thin and not very muscular. I want more of these!!
customer_reviews.author: dpsteno

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dress. Very forgiving for my overweight body. Well made. Love the material. I plan to wear it to a Bohemian semi formal wedding. I did post pictures below. For reference, I am 5'0" 155lbs 36C and I ordered a large.
customer_reviews.author: Adventures of the Summer Family

customer_reviews.title: Dress it up or keep it casual!.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!. I jazzed it up a little with some bling for my brothers wedding in UK. I had an aircast on my leg, this dress hid it well. Doesn't crease, so easy to wear. You can dress it up as I did, or wear it casual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Perfect for my body shape.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I am 5'5 so I wear it with heals and it still hits the floor but I love that. I ordered a medium and it fits great. I am 135lbs, 35-29-39. So comfy it feels like PJ's. Also I don't like showing my cleavage so I just wear an undershirt and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: I love these dresses yes they are somewhat see thru but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these dresses yes they are somewhat see thru but only if your standing still and in direct Sunlight but that's not a problem for me. I'm 5'4" 115lbs and small fits just fine you can wear a slip under it or in my case I wear a tank top under my dress so my chest isn't out at work also wear leggings and boots in the winter with the dress
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it for my daughter's baptism, and it was perfect for nursing, modest for my large chest (DD) and hid all of my post partum bumps and imperfections. I received so many compliments on it, and it is very well made! Also, I am 5'6, wore a small kitten heel, and the length was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jade McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely sexy and beautiful dress perfect for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Absolutely sexy and beautiful dress perfect for any occasion, vacation, lounging or shopping! Love this dress and just ordered a second one. I was concerned about the fit of the arm based on all of the comments but the size XL arms fit fine for me. I have average size arms and wear a size 16/16W! Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, multi colors not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the multicolor dress in a size large. I'm 5' 61/2", 140lbs., and a 34-36D and normally wear a size 8 or medium. I felt the large fit me very well and was flattering for my figure but not snug. I did try it on wearing a shape wear cami underneath. I decided to return it however because the colors didn't look as they did online. I purchased a dress that I saw as patterned with dominate aqua shades with red accents.... What I got looked very yellow, beige, and black dominate in the pattern with orange red accents. Hope this helps others.
customer_reviews.author: GillianLF

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit snug but still comfortable. I absolutely love this dress
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a small as they were sold out of the medium in the red floral (I am 5'3", currently 36/29/40). Knowing I took a risk I didn't expect it to fit but it does! Just a bit snug but still comfortable. I absolutely love this dress. The fabric is a nice heavy and very stretchy material, it's very elegant and flattering, and the print is exactly as shown. I never spend this much on a dress but I'm so glad I took the dive, this dress is one of my favorites now!
customer_reviews.author: JRUSH

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress! Fabulous print, figure flattering, and can be dressed up or down. Seems to be a really nice quality piece. I've worn it twice and get so many compliments on it. I haven't washed it yet, so I don't know how it will do. The fabric has good stretch but holds it's form. No problems with see-through or anything like that. It does need a tank top or bandeau underneath like on the model, otherwise is likely to show bra. I'm 5'7 and it hits just below the ankle on me, does not touch the floor. It comes with a tie belt but would look great with another belt too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Tall girl's dream!
customer_reviews.text: I almost sent this dress back because I felt like it was overpriced. But it fits like a GLOVE (which is rare for me because I'm 6 ft tall and wear a women's 12-14. I ordered an XL and it was perfect.) I've only worn it twice and both times I got constant compliments. Did I mention that it's so comfortable it's like wearing pajamas? I rarely leave product reviews but this dress is freaking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2", 160 lbs. I bought a large. This is so beautiful. I was afraid that this would be too long for me like most things. If i wear a small heel it is perfect. The material is so comfortable that i almost don't want to take it off. I have a 34DD bust and my chest does not pop out and I also don't need a cami to go under it. The way the wrap fits your chest makes it almost perfect for everyone. I am very pleased with this item. It is the only dress that I bought out of 5 that I didn't return.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: GET THE DRESS.TREAT YOURSELF
customer_reviews.text: If you are questioning whether you should get this dress, DONT!! I am obsessed!! I was super skeptical, but it is well worth the price! I am 5'6, 36C bust and 155lbs.. waist is about a 34/35 and hips are 38-40.. the dress fits perfect! Super stretchy fabric so it's comfy and I have some room to move.. length literally brushes the floor! Perfect maxi length!
customer_reviews.author: tamera tycz

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This dress was much prettier than I expected. I was figuring I'd have to return it but I was pleasantly surprised. I'm a true size 14 and about 5'6". It's long but I wanted it long. I am very high wasted and about a 36 DD. It fits perfectly and looks great. It's a silky, kind of weighty material but not heavy. It skims the body. The arms are a little tight but I don't mind that, makes them look toned and thinner...lol. The V-neck isn't too low. It's very pretty...hippy chic. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit
customer_reviews.text: I love what this dress does to my figure.. I love the length.. I am going on a Caribbean vac and would love to have solid color options.. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dita

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. Always get lot's of compliments every time I wear. I do recommend that you machine wash on warm and let it air dry. I have dried it in the dryer but left it a little damp. I've bought 6 of these dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Renise

customer_reviews.title: Great dress
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about size but went one size up to have the dress be floor length (based on reviews) so I can wear heels. Dress is heavier and really pretty. I am 5'5 and 130lbs. I bought the medium. I'm wearing heels in the photo and the dress is the perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely dress. It fit fine. The fabric is stretchy, so is very forgiving. I am 42" chest, waist in the mid 30's, and the xl fit just fine. I am 5'8" and it is nice and long - nearly on the floor. Would be fine with 1"-2" heels or higher. The fabric is a medium weight. The pattern is just as pictured. Although it IS teal, the background color which makes up the bodice is navy - not a good color on me. Sadly, it is a beautiful dress, but just doesn't look good enough on ME. I am returning it, but I would still recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Go To Dress
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the dress twice now and absolutely LOVE it! I've received so many compliments. The material is comfortable, the dress is well made. For those wondering about sizing and fit - I'm 5'8" and around 200lbs, 38DD, kind of hourglass shaped (or maybe it's cello shape when you're this large lol). I ordered an XL and it fit great. There's a little room in the chest, it's not tight in the tummy, flows well everywhere else. If I were to lose 5-10lbs, I'd probably order the large. It's very long (which I love) - touches the floor slightly with no heels on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. Not like the picture. Other reviewers are right about the not so subtle colors. The picture makes it seem like the material is this shimmering fabric and is loose fitting. The dress ended up being this cheap looking awkward stretchy material that clings in the body rather than sitting nicely. I'm 5'4 120lbs and this dress was tight in places like the arm. I would've kept it because for the most part the pattern was still decent like in the picture. However, the pattern on the sleeves were way off. The round medallion patterns in the forearm were also duplicated on the biceps. Made it look like I had sausage snake arms.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: there were a lot of great reviews on this and i took a chance on ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! there were a lot of great reviews on this and i took a chance on it. I'm the first to review this particular print. It's lovely. I'm normally a size 4, or a small. I'm 5'2", 125 lbs. The fit is perfect. It has a lot of forgiveness due to stretchy fabric. I'm short so i will need to take it up 2" on the hem. no big deal. For this price of $25, if you don't like maxi dresses, it would look cute as a short dress cutting off much fabric at the hem of course. I would like to buy more colors
customer_reviews.author: golfergirl

customer_reviews.title: Casual material
customer_reviews.text: This dress was cute for a casual dinner or party dress. The only issue I had was the style was a little too casual for what I was looking for. I think this was due to the cheapish looking spandexy material. It fit a little tighter than I expected. Not in an uncomfortable way: just wasn't the loose flowy style I expected. In fact the dress was extremely comfortable and I can see some people really liking it. It just didn't have the style I was looking for so I returned it. I'm 5'4" 120 pounds and got the small in teal.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, but I was misled with the style.
customer_reviews.text: In the picture, it looks like there is a black piece sewn in the bosom area. This is the only dress with this picture and that's why I ordered it. I have tried wearing a camisole, but that bit of material makes the dress too tight for me in that area. I will most likely send the dress back, but only for this reason. Otherwise, the dress fits on the smaller side and is very flattering. I am not a fan of the belt, but it could be unattached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found a very nice, attractive dress.
customer_reviews.text: This dress fits well and fabric drapes nicely. Comfortable to wear, wash and pack. I'm 5'4" and weigh 104 pounds-dress size 4 petite. It was too long but was easy to have shortened. The V neck line was too low for me so had some of the fabric from cut off hem sewn across the lowest part of V. Very happy with the dress as not been able to find anything of its quality found in stores.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Wrap Around Maxi Dress
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful dress. I have recently lost a few pounds and hoped to fit into a medium. But, no, must lose a few more. I so wanted to fit in this beautiful dress. It is gorgeous. Nice weight rayon jersey material, lovely colors. But, alas, my figure doesn't quite match the model's, having a bit more padding around the waist. It takes a gal with a thinner waist than mine to wear this lovely creation. Maybe in a few months I'll be able to! Hope so. Then, I WILL purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Dress
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely dress. I'm 5'5" and wear size 6-8 pants, since I have a 41" bust I ordered size large. I'm so glad I did beacause this dress is cut trim in the sleeves and shoulders and the hem just barely dusts the floor. So if you are wavering between sizes, ordered the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Salley

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected.Love this dress, colors are amazing. Got it in a size "L" , however, $70.00 bucks is a bit too pricey as the fabric appears to be a bit on the cheap side and made of poor quality. $20 -$25 bucks would have been more of a decent pricing for this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Seriously

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dress and I love the pattern. I still wear it sometimes but I got to say I’m not one the sweats much but your pits will reek in this dress! And it’s hard to get the smell out. I was even wearing deodorant! I’ve never seen that before. It must be the fabric of the dress. Don’t wear in summer time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I am in LOVE with this dress
customer_reviews.text: First, if I could give a 4.5 I would. The only real "issues" I have with the dress is the bust is a bit big (but I just wore a cami underneath (which I would have done anyways as a teacher) and the length was a bit long (so I wore heels as I don't own any wedges right now), which again isn't a huge deal to me. Otherwise I am in LOVE with this dress. The moment I walked into work I was receiving compliments. It is super comfortable and flowy. I'm definitely planning on ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is five star dress if you are tall and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is five star dress if you are tall and a little curvier at the bottom. It kills me to return it because it is gorgeous! It's also insanely soft and comfy. I am 5'4" 116 lbs, 34C, size 2 on the top, 4-6 on the bottom. This dress fit up top. It was one to two sizes too big on the bottom. It was also at least three inches too long. Hemming the dress would have destroyed the pattern at the bottom, and it would have no longer matched the sleeve bottoms. If you are tall and not too narrow in the bottom absolutely get this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Reads

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dress, it is so comfortable and so pretty. I love the colors. I felt like it did run a bit small-I usually wear an 8-10 and I ordered a large, it was snug.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: This dress is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is perfect!!!!! It was but on a whim because it was on sale. What a deal! I'm 5'6 120 and I got a small. It is maybe an inch longer than I would like but with shoes it's really fine. I would buy more in the future it's really a perfect autum dress and even early spring.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up but I could have bought the size large. I would rather the dress have been loose than too tight. This dress is timeless...bohemian classic. I can wear it almost any where and feel lovely. No wrinkles straight out of the bag, put on a hanger and ready to wear. YYYYYYay.
customer_reviews.author: SC579

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dress
customer_reviews.text: The patterns and pops of color exceeds my expectations. This is my most favorite purchase so far and I have purchased alot. True to size. I'm 5'10 and will need a slight 1-2" sandal to get off the ground. Not clingy but shows your curves. Very, very please. Will wear with black sandals because of the patterns. Wearing to work tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Dee55

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress but wrong measurements
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot 4, 166 pounds, 38 B bra. I ordered the large: it would not fit around my bust at all, the arms were like a vise, the "waist" was only large enough to fit snugly under my bust..The length, however was correct. The jewel tone dress is lovely, but the is sizing all wrong. Maybe I was sent a medium or a small? But a larger size would be way too late ng, so i am returning it. Too bad (:
customer_reviews.author: grandmom x 5

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me. Cheap fabric.
customer_reviews.text: The print is pretty, but the shape of the dress made my hourglass figure look boxy. The top part was too loose and sort of draped over the waist. I'm not sure if it's supposed to fit that way but It just didn't work for me. It was also too short (I'm 5'9" 123lbs). I'd also expect a better quality fabric for the price. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Krista T.

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering dress, but sleeves are TIGHT!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like the dress, but I have to agree with some other reviewers that the sleeves are oddly tight. I ordered a medium and the fit everywhere else is fine, but the sleeves are super tight. Once it's on, it doesn't really look too tight in the sleeves, but it's getting it on and adjusting the sleeves (so that the bodice fits correctly) that's a problem. And, btw, don't think I have particularly big and'/or muscular arms. Also, if I ordered a large to get bigger sleeves, I feel like the rest of the dress would be too big. All that being said, the dress is very flattering and overall I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: This dress is great! I bought it for a wedding and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This dress is great! I bought it for a wedding and I needed something that would travel well (i.e. not wrinkle). I think that the pictures make the print look a little lighter than it actually is, but I am still very happy with it. I noticed other people had written that the dress was tight on top, so I ordered a size up. I am a C-D cup, and ordered a medium. I am 5'2" so it is pretty long, but I am fine with wearing tall wedges (the wedding was in the forest). I definitely recommend this dress!
customer_reviews.author: Erik S.

customer_reviews.title: Barely long enough
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and I ordered a large for the length. Everything fit perfectly, and the dress lightly brushes the floor when I'm barefoot. If it were any shorter, I would have returned it. It barely made the cut. I haven't washed it yet, but if it shrinks at all, I'm going to have a problem. As far as the tummy area, it is very flattering. The material is also comfortable and light, but not see through. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone 5'7" and under.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cut, Always Gets Complements!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd dress I've ordered from On Trend- I ALWAYS get complemented on these dresses. They are flowy, can be dressed up or down, and the cut is flattering. I'm a size 14/16, and am 5' 11.5" tall, so this XL is a bit roomy and sweeps the floor. I probably could have gone with a Large, but either way these are GREAT dresses. Since the skirt is cut as an A line it slims you. I do always have to pin the top so as not to show too much cleavage, but that or a tank top will work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Mac Pherson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Dress!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Yes, at 1st you may be taken aback by all the colors and patterns, but once you put it on, all those patterns and colors combine to create a new you that you will LOVE! So flattering, flowy & fabulous. I did have it altered (hemmed about 5 inches), but I'm only 4'10.5". I still had more than enough of the lower border pattern to maintain the balance of colors/patterns of the fabric. Also, it is a bit low cut (on me). A simple cami fixed that. Great, really great dress. Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: James & Annie Peattie

customer_reviews.title: Actual color is much different than photo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this dress in "multi-colored" for months before I finally decided to order it. When I got it, I was so disappointed that the color of the dress is much different than the picture. Not nearly as blue. All the light blue you see is actually a very dark navy. In fact, all of the colors are darker than they appear in the photo. The fit was perfect and like the other reviews state, is very flattering. But I will unfortunately be returning it because it does not look at all like the dress I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy material, but so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice dress with great fabric, a bit heavy, though. A bit too big for me, but kept it anyway because I wore it to an event. I'm 5'9" and the length was a bit too long for me, so had to keep picking up when walking around. The neckline was a bit low, so needed tape to keep in place for no "wardrobe malfunction" moments.
customer_reviews.author: Y. A. Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Simply made, pretty dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is simple and pretty and I felt great wearing it. The other reviews suggested buying a size larger because it runs small, so I bough the size medium dress and it fit perfectly. I love the vibrant colors - the material is definitely synthetic, so use the hand wash setting on your washing machine and hang it over a rod to dry. Great dress - love it! I'm buying another in a different pattern :-)
customer_reviews.author: SunCelt

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great. The material is not cheap
customer_reviews.text: I always get lots of compliments when I wear this dress. I will definitely be ordering more from on trend. The quality is great. The material is not cheap, the seams are sewn well, the colors are vibrant and I don't see them fading at all. I love this dress and I'm so happy that it worked out for me. I am always reluctant to buy clothes online. I try to look in the reviews to see what other women my same height and weight bought. I am 5'7 and 170 lbs. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress simply because I like the look, not for any specific occasion. I have already worn it once to a play and was told by one attendee how elegant it looked. I am not crazy about 3/4 length sleeves, but the pattern and fall of the dress are so eye-catching that it is easily overlooked. I consistently wear a 4 and ordered a small, which fits well. The skirt is very flowing and almost touches the floor (I am 5'8"). Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ghall

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful! Bright colors and very confortable. I am 5'2" 180 lbs hourglass shape. Ordered XL and it fits perfectly. Soft and flowy. A bit long since I'm on the short side, which was expected on a size XL. Even with high heels drags a bit. Maybe with higher platform pumps or wedges will do the trick. Package arrived quickly. I will definetly reorder in another print! Will try a smaller size for length purposes ;)
customer_reviews.author: LiMa32

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dress!
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling, flattering, comfortable dress. Wear with cute flat sandals or strappy heels or cute platforms... really beautiful on. Moroccan feel. I purchased the XL and I am 5'9" and about 185 lbs. Fit was perfect. Length may be a bit long for some shorter girls. The dress was very figure flattering and slimming. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sher E.

customer_reviews.title: I do wish the neck wasn't so low but otherwise I love the dress
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments every time I wear this dress. I am larger this dress is the most flattering I have right now. I do wish the neck wasn't so low but otherwise I love the dress. The material is such that you can throw it in a suitcase and not worry about ironing when you get it back out. (I took it to Africa with me and it was great!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to purchase this, but it's absolutely beautiful. Great fit, very nice material. I am so surprised at how nice it is! I'm wearing it to a charity event, but it would work for a more formal, or a more casual event. Perfect for the summer! I'm very happy with this purchase. Some questioned if it was a traditional wrap dress, and it isn't. It's stitched together, but has the appearance of a wrap.
customer_reviews.author: DVuno

customer_reviews.title: fit great. the material was very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to a wedding and I received many compliments! fit great. the material was very comfortable. It can be dressed up or down depending on shoes and jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: tizzle

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this dress for me for Valentine's Day. I absolutely love it. It fits really well and is very flattering. The V-neck comes down a little low, so if you don't wear an under shirt you will be sporting a but of cleavage. I have worn and washed the dress multiple times and it has held up great. I should note that I wash all my dresses on cold, gentle and hand dry them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Genisee

customer_reviews.title: Good dress
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress!!! I am 5'8" 145 lb size D cup lanky arms and legs though and size L is perfect length, either with flips or boots, a little lightweight but not see through, extremely comfortable but very cute, lots of compliments, I'm very pleased with this purchase. I am going to buy another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: CKS

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and figure flattering!
customer_reviews.text: After several disappointing dress purchases from Amazon, I was about to give up and then I saw this and thought I'd give it one more try. This dress exceeded my expectations. So beautiful and figure flattering. For reference, I am 5'6 and 160 pounds, and the medium fits perfectly. The length is just right - not too long or short. I can't wait to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: The design/color pattern is completely different than in the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: The design/color pattern is completely different than in the pictures! Mine is more of an orange, brown, and blue, not this pattern in the picture which is a brown, blue, and mahogany. The print and fabric is higher quality though compared to other dressmakers of this style dress.
customer_reviews.author: YumYumArt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but poorly made: after one *gentle* wearing, it came apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: Good news: absolutely beautiful dress, vivid colors, sophisticated yet bohemian at the same time. Bad news: Wore it gently *one time* for an hour and half tops. The next time I put it on, the sleeve had separated completely from the body of the dress: MAJOR BUMMER. That said, I still love it but cannot vouch for the quality of the workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow factor
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! I am hourglass figured, with a butt lol. 5'9 155 lbs fit build. Medium was perfect and length is great! The colors are amazing. New favorite dress! I got the purple colors.
customer_reviews.author: NYWhi

customer_reviews.title: Earth goddess gown. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite garment I've ever bought online. 5'9",168 and hourglass D-cup. XL fit me perfectly with a little room. I don't like things too tight. This dress hugs curves in all the right ways. Reaches my ankles so may need to be hemmed for shorter gals. I'm getting other colors!
customer_reviews.author: skullkitty

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 10, ordered a large. ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10, ordered a large. It is too long and I wear it with heals. I have to tie the waist twice, but it is GORGEOUS!!!! Will be buying more in the future, just a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Boho Glam
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this color and ordered a Large vs my usual XL....the fit is perfect, the colors are beautiful, and I'm back to order another. I'm 5 '4, and it definitely requires hemming unless you are 5'9 or taller...it pools on the floor and even with a 3" wedge it's a fracture in the making. Fabric is soft and silky and drapes perfectly even without shapewear. The fabric can be a bit much for summer, so I'd say it's a 3-season or summer with good air conditioning dress.
customer_reviews.author: DashOneCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: The dress is well made and I think on a taller person it would look lovely, for me it was just way too much dress. I have ordered others from on trend and love them. This one was just way too much on the top, not the dress at all but rather my height and all I just couldn't pull off that many patterns. I have some that are the black top with the flowered skirt that I love. The prompt return was greatly appreciated. I filled out the form, printed out the slip and mailed it back the same day. Loved that.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. F

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: I got a large -- I'm 5 ft 4 and about 180 lbs, and it was too small. I normally buy XL but some of the reviews said it ran large. Had to return for an XL so I guess it fits as you would expect not large. I'm pear shaped with a C-cup bra. Hope the XL fits because the dress is absolutely gorgeous and made of a comfortable material. It's long so I think I will need to wear some kind of wedge with it. Love that this doesn't look like everything else out there.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too long for me
customer_reviews.text: This dress is truly beautiful. However, the length was just too long for me. I feel like if I took a wrong step I'd fall flat on my face. I really do wish it was 3 inches shorter (I could wear heels but I still don't feel safe in a maxi dress wearing heels). I am 5'4 and around 150 pounds and I ordered the small. The dress was soft and flows nice. Still a beautifully designed dress and I'd recommend anyone around the 5'7 - and higher height to buy this dress.
customer_reviews.author: ABock

customer_reviews.title: Great dress
customer_reviews.text: I am not a thin person and this dress looks amazing on. Good quality. I'm 5'8" and it almost hits the floor. I ordered an XL. I may wear a thin tank top underneath so that there isn't too much cleavage, but it's ok without. I would buy this if it came in solid colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Land

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. A tad too long, will have to get it hemmed a little. But just love the fact when traveling that I can throw it in a bag, take it out and not have to worry about any wrinkles. Just slip it on and go. So many people have made nice comments about this dress too. I have another dress from this designer and again, just throw in my suitcase and it is ready for wearing any time. Can't wait to get some more!
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: So Dang Cute and Flattering
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I am in love. I ordered it on a whim and could not be happier. I ordered the XL. I usually wear a 12. I have a D to DD chest so unlike the model I do not need to wear a Cami. Fits perfect. I am going to wear it with boots this fall/winter. I am going to order another. One of the bright colors for when I am in Mexico at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Krio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: Only buy this dress if you are looking for something: - Flattering - Feminine - Well made - Comfortable I'm 5'2", 135 lbs and ordered the small. It fit like a dream! This dress hits all the right curves in all the right places and manages to make me look long and willowy, which are two things I have never, ever been. The only downside is I will have to hem it up about 2". Still worth it to the point that I am planning on ordering in another color soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rew12

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS DRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 180lbs 5'5" and this fit perfectly. The colors are vivid and as pictured, the material is soft and flows perfectly, the length was perfect. I wore a body shaper underneath to smooth out my curves and I loved the way it made me feel.
customer_reviews.author: JMO

customer_reviews.title: extremely overpriced - cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: extremely thin and cheap fabric.....WAY too much money to be charging for this. This should be priced under 20$, don't buy it. Off it goes, back to Amazon. I don't think I'll be buying clothes online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: pillpusha5

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The dress is amazing and the colors are out of this world. The red is not burt or burgundy as my screen shows, but a red. I only wanted to point that out. The sleeves aren't loose on me as they are on the model. It isn't a problem at all, but I just wanted to make it clear. The length is long and I always wear heels. I'm 5'8" and I ordered a medium - bust size 34C. I get tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I wore this last week to a fair and received multiple compliments. It is very comfortable with a flattering fit. I took the advice of other reviewers and ordered a large for my 5'9" 145-pound frame. The length is to the floor in flat sandals, and the arms are not too tight, though I did have to pin the front to prevent overexposure. I do not typically buy clothing online, so I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: EPaddon

customer_reviews.title: this dress feels great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Although I am returning (it shows my stomach bump a little too much), this dress feels great and looks great. I am 51 and this would have looked perfect just a few years ago. Except for the stomach, it camouflages other imperfections very well. Love the Bohemian styled fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan L

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple and mustard yellow dress
customer_reviews.text: Love the purple and mustard yellow dress. This dress feels like robe of elegance and soft smooth silk on your skin. The small feels like it was made for my body. I am 5'7, 130 pounds, large chest, small waist, and thick hips. This dress makes me look tall and lean...love it! It is a little shorter than expected, with 3 inch heels it shows the shoes. If I wear flats, then the fabric dusts the ground. Great quality, love the design, will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Capri Sun

customer_reviews.title: Bohemian Dress
customer_reviews.text: I love the material and the colors and pattern, but it fit too big and too long. I was hoping to wear lower-heeled boots, but would need a higher heel with this one. (5'6") I ordered up as suggested (I usually take a 10 in dresses) and ordered the large. I think the medium may have worked better, but I didn't reorder it because the price jumped up, and the function I was going to wear it to was over. Maybe I will look for it again sometime I need a dress like this.
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly ,  color is vibrant,  material  is soft. I ordered  my size.
customer_reviews.text: The size small dress fits perfectly. I'm 5'1", 117 lbs and wear b cup. It's a little long, 2 or 3 inches, I'll need to hem as usual. The top is fitted (for a b cup perfectly) but it's not tight anywhere. I usually wear a small or xs. So it's True to size. And it's very comfortable. The color is amazing and the material is soft. The material and pattern are very forgiving, it's slimming. I think it would have also looked great when I was 60 lbs heavier. I recommend it, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Piwi

customer_reviews.title: Many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I received many compliments in this dress. One woman said it was "sexy" and I should wear it all the time. If fit perfectly except a little tight in the arms, but my arms are big. I wore it with a big soft belt rather than the slim one that come with it. The length was good, maybe a little long for a very short person. Highly recommended for a relaxed party, even wedding, on the west coast.
customer_reviews.author: rocco

customer_reviews.title: Much shorter then expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the print but I have this same dress in a different print and this one was about 6 inches shorter. I was so excited to finally find a long dress (I’m 5 ‘11) but I had to return this one. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I think it's comfortable, and my coworkers think it's professional and unique
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous dress. I get stopped on the street whatever I'm wearing it and people compliment me on it constantly. My husband thinks it's sexy, I think it's comfortable, and my coworkers think it's professional and unique. Buy this dress. I have to wear a undershirt with it when I wear it in public because the wrap is very low-cut but it's awesome. My body is not fantastic, I have lots of bumps and feel overweight, but when I put this dress on I feel fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing should have been fine, but wasn't & it was defective
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but defective and not in line with recommended sizing charts they provided. It arrived with a hole on one sleeve and the size was quite small. I am 5ft.6in. and weigh 112 lbs. The small was doable, but snug above the belt. That along with the hole on the sleeve means this dress is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Loving life

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress - fit a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty dress - fit was somewhat small and I'm a size 2-4. (I ordered small) I ended up giving it away - colors were lovely. Fit was not as relaxed as shown. Good price and material was good.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho buyer

customer_reviews.title: Other wise the Color is Great..
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews....The Sleeves are Small but I think they will Stretch out....Needs to be pinned .... wear a shirt under...Cut is Low..I held it up to the light I think it does need a Slip under it. For you can see through it..I ordered the Multicolored in my Normal size Medium.. .I'm 5'3 134 pounds.36 C.....the Length is a little long but going to wear a Wedge Heel with it...and a Body Shaper...I have a little pooch....Other wise the Color is Great...Advise Stretching the Sleeves out some before putting it on though.
customer_reviews.author: TRACI L. GONZALES

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was colorful, soft, very comfortable, stretchy and does not wrinkle! I am 5ft 7in and weigh 153 and the medium fit very nicely.Length was at top of my feet, no need to shorten. Also hides figure flaws to some degree. The model in the picture is wearing what looks like a black cami under the dress and it is a good idea as it is lower than I am comfortable with. I love the dress!
customer_reviews.author: Horses Rule!

customer_reviews.title: IThe arms a re pretty tight and looks pretty ugly and my husband noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors of the dress I received are not the same as pictures on the website. The colors used in the arms (red) don't go well with the bottom of the dress. the patterns won't follow.. IThe arms a re pretty tight and looks pretty ugly and my husband noticed that right away. I feel like I wasted $52 on it and I cant even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Donate to kids consignment
customer_reviews.text: Chest and arms are for anorexic. I bought this same dress from another line and fit more accurate. I'm donating to a children's consignment
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D

customer_reviews.title: Most flattering dress I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: One of the most flattering, magical dresses I’ve ever bought. Everything cuts, hangs, wraps in the most flattering manner. I’ve gained 25 lbs this year, but this dress shows it only where it counts... butt & boobs ;) the best surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress! Got several compliments on this dress. It is a tad bit low cut, which I expected, but a tank underneath works just fine. This dress is very comfortable as well. Will definitely be looking for more On Trend dresses, I am now a huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: I'm 4"10 and wear 5inch heels and perfect length. Got a L a tad big in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. I'm 4"10 and wear 5inch heels and perfect length. Got a L a tad big in shoulders, but fits my butt. Could have gone with M if wore spanx.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Rengel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, bought 3 On Trend dresses
customer_reviews.text: I am a size zero and 5 ft 4. This dress arrived and was perfect length to my ankles. I washed it before wearing and hung to dry without it loosing its shape or fit. I bought two other dresses from On Trend and love that this one has the best full length sleeves vs. bracelet length sleeves on the other two). Its super hard to find long sleeved maxi dresses and this is a definite keeper.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress! Soft material and fits perfectly! I am 5’5, 105lbs 34A chest 25in waist, 34 hips. It is long but plan on wearing with heels and it will be perfect! Love this dress excited to wear to a wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo + Jdogg

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress for my baby shower. I hate ordering things. They are never what I expect. So I was very reluctant about this, considering the price! I got it today......it is awesome! I couldn't be happier. I'm usually a large, so I ordered the XL because of the growing bump. It fits perfect...not too tight, not too loose. I'm about 5"6 and it just brushes the ground. Love it. I'd order several more.....maybe they will go on sale. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dress. I received more compliments wearing this dress ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dress. I received more compliments wearing this dress than I have in a long time. People came up to me on the street and praised the pattern. Fit wonderfully, although long as a maxi dress should be, a pair of heels is all it took. I bought three of them in different colors. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Glogowski

customer_reviews.title: Too small- unusual for On Trend Maxis!
customer_reviews.text: Most my On Trend dresses are medium but this one was way too small. Waist was very high and chest was too exposed. Love On Trend! It’s like travel wear and very easy to pack and go!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful/ silk like fabric
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft fabric, almost like silk...I love this dress! Worth the money!...Item came early too...however, it is a bit long, so will need to hem about an inch, I'm 5'5...135-140 lbs👍🏽😊💕
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cottom-Mann

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, versatile and packs well
customer_reviews.text: This was rolled up in a suitcase for a week and still looked great. It fits great and is flattering on me. It hits the top of my feet and I'm 5'7". I got the XL and usually wear about a 16. Very versatile, I wore it with birks and beads on vacation, and a blazer and flats for a funeral.
customer_reviews.author: burgi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and figure flattering
customer_reviews.text: Love this On Trend Paris Bohemian dress, great material, drapes beautifully and very figure flattering. I wore this to a bridal shower and received several compliments. I also purchased the same “on trend” style dress but in solid colors: nave blue and red. Unfortunately the material on the solid colored dresses is very different from the patterned dresses so take note. The material varies from dress to dress. In any event, I’m very happy with the bohemian dress and it’s one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Maxi
customer_reviews.text: Best price for this dress!!! It was perfect and I love it. I'm 5'2 and only an inch maybe inch and a half too long, so if you are tall make sure you check length. Short girls out there here,This is a maxi for us!! Yeah!!! I weigh 120 and ordered sm.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela harrell

product_meta.title: On Trend Women's Paris Bohemian V-Neck Printed 3/4 Sleeve Faux Wrap Long Maxi Resort Dress
feature_bullets: Paris Bohemian 3/4 Sleeve Long Maxi Dress is On Trend. Look stunning, sophisticated and stylish in this On Trend Signature wardrobe staple.

Classic faux-wrap dress crafted in a stretch fabric. Silky and slimming excentuating curves in the right ways. This lovely dress has a surplice v neckline, tie belt with loops at waist, faux wrap and solid fabric bottom (not open or slit). Made in the USA.

On Trend is an expert offering the perfect, effortless travel dress. Enjoy this dress with easy care. This dress is easily packable and can be dressed up or down. Wrinkle-resistant, no ironing! The perfect vacation resort dress.

Whether it's a casual engagement, plane ride, day at the beach, a work meeting or a party night out. Always be On Trend. This designer dress is a perfect transitional piece, that will take you well into, fall, winter, spring and summer! The fabric is heavy allowing the dress to hang beautifully. Versatile classic!

Small: Bust 32" Waist 26", Hip 34", Length 55.5"// Medium: Bust 34", Waist 28", Hip 36", Length 57"// Large: Bust 36", Waist 29", Hip 40", Length 58" If you are in between sizes we suggest you go up a size. Runs small in arms.
